section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: The sealing and expungement relief available under this chapter shall apply retroactively.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-284: § 301 of D.C. Law 24-284 provided that the creation of this section by § 101(b) of D.C. Law 24-284 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-284: § 301 of D.C. Law 24-284 provided that the creation of this section by § 101(b) of D.C. Law 24-284 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7088 of D.C. Law 25-50 amended section 301 of D.C. Law 24-284 changing the applicability provision impacting this section to January 1, 2026. Therefore the creation of this section by section 101(b) of Law 24-284 will be implemented on January 1, 2026.

Section 40(b) of D.C. Law 25-175 amended section 301 of D.C. Law 24-284 changing the applicability provision impacting this section to October 1, 2024. Therefore the creation of this section by section 101(b) of Law 24-284 will be implemented on October 1, 2024.
